0.query: SELECT l_returnflag, l_linestatus, SUM(l_quantity) as sum_qty, SUM(l_extendedprice) as sum_base_price, SUM(l_extendedprice*(1.0-l_discount)) as sum_disc_price, SUM(l_extendedprice*(1.0-l_discount)*(1.0+l_tax)) as sum_charge, AVG(l_quantity) as avg_qty, AVG(l_extendedprice) as avg_price, AVG(l_discount) as avg_disc, COUNT(*) as count_order FROM lineitem WHERE l_shipdate <= '1998-12-01' GROUP BY l_returnflag, l_linestatus ORDER BY l_returnflag, l_linestatus;
